script: In a sunlit park, a little girl strolls carefree, clutching her beloved teddy bear close. Suddenly, a growl breaks the calm as a fierce dog charges toward her, but with a burst of courage, the teddy bear springs to life, standing tall and fearless to shield her. The dog retreats, and relief floods her face as she embraces her brave companion. The vibrant scene gently fades, revealing the girl safe in her cozy bedroom, cuddling the same teddy bear, a small toy dog lying still beside her—a glimpse into the vivid world of her imagination. Softly, words appear: “Teddy bear, always there to comfort.”
